Posts.Content: during the last surgery she admitted to two different hospitals, then to a rehab facility at the rehab facility they informed us she had mrsa and was getting proper tx. Scar tissue has nearly covered the whole area now, Doctors are unwilling to offer any suggestions. Due to prior medical conditions no one wants to tx.

Posts.Content: I hope that everything is better
